description:
Configures which approach should be used in the network discovery process. There are two possible values: (0) no network scan will be performed â€“ rather, registration and connection will be attempted with each eSIM profile in descending order of preference; or (1) Network scan will be performed using the current active eSIM profile. This option works for modems that when performing a network scan show the complete list of available networks independently of which eSIM profile is active.
 This setting is only available to Windows Insiders
name: NetworkDiscoveryOption

options.description: No network scan will be performed -- rather, registration and connection will be attempted with each eSIM profile in descending order of preference.
options.name: No network scan will be performed -- rather, registration and connection will be attempted with each eSIM profile in descending order of preference.
options.displayName: No network scan will be performed -- rather, registration and connection will be attempted with each eSIM profile in descending order of preference.

options.description: Network scan will be performed using the current active eSIM profile.
options.name: Network scan will be performed using the current active eSIM profile.
options.displayName: Network scan will be performed using the current active eSIM profile.
